Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by stating that "hundreds of Indians" are running to block illegal Chinese construction, when the video does not provide evidence of this.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough supporting evidence to prove that the video is indeed related to Indians blocking illegal Chinese construction along the border.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video is depicting Indians running to block illegal Chinese construction, without verifying the authenticity or context of the video.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video is not recent and does not represent any recent incident related to the India-China border dispute.
Exist alternative explanation: The video is found to be from Myanmar, suggesting an alternative explanation that it is not related to Indians blocking Chinese construction along the LAC.
Falters at times: The claim falters by not thoroughly investigating the source and context of the video before making assumptions about its content.
